LBL_CONSENT_GSTN: GSTN has been assigned the task of collection of data of existing taxpayers under indirect taxes for their smooth transition to GST. Since I would like to continue my business operations under GST regime, I agree to provide details sought by GSTN as per Form devised under the Model Goods and Services Tax Act (GST Act). I understand that the GST Act shall come into force as on  the date to be notified by the Central/ State Government and the provisional registration number issued shall be effective only from the date to be notified.

LBL_MSME_MAINHEAD: Vendor List - Accounting and Billing Software Products
LBL_MSME_CONT1: System should have access for Single User
LBL_MSME_CONT2: System should be in English and have all item Units , Financial Years Facility
LBL_MSME_CONT3: Supplier, Customers Master Directory with all the required field
LBL_MSME_CONT5: Should be able to Print invoices and ledger
LBL_MSME_CONT6: Should have easy migration of data from one accounting  & billing software  to other accounting & billing software
LBL_MSME_CONT7: Item (SKU) Search - Search Item by Bar Code, Short Code or by Description.
LBL_MSME_CONT8: Item master with HSN code, description, Unit of measure (UoM), price, tax rate etc.
LBL_MSME_CONT9: Taxation – Automatic calculation of Taxes (GST) payable. Rate of tax must be editable in the item master
LBL_MSME_CONT10: Charges - Includes other charges in the bill.
LBL_MSME_CONT11: Cancelling/ Voiding - Sales Bill can be cancelled any time before submission
LBL_MSME_CONT12: Search Bill from history- By customer, date or bill number. Min 3 month period for search. For archival, period will be 5 years. Goods return facility
LBL_MSME_CONT13: System should be able to issue/display Credit note Debit note including pending & Replacement Notes
LBL_MSME_CONT14: Supplier Selection - Enter purchase bill either by Supplier or Cash Purchase. Manage supplier master.
LBL_MSME_CONT15: Generation of purchase order and maintenance of purchase register
LBL_MSME_CONT16: Linking of suppliers invoice with Purchase Order
LBL_MSME_CONT18: Taxation – Automated calculation of GST payable per Purchase Order.
LBL_MSME_CONT19: Search purchase - By supplier, date and bill number, it also should show supplier Wise .Min 3 month period for search. For archival, period will be 5 years.
LBL_MSME_CONT20: Generate Profit and Loss and Balance sheet
LBL_MSME_CONT21: Sales/ Purchase Register Report - Detailed, Day wise, Item wise Month wise, Quarter for the period selected.
LBL_MSME_CONT22: Sales / Purchase receivable and payable Report
LBL_MSME_CONT25: System should be able to export reports and all data to Excel/PDF or any other format as required for returns.
LBL_MSME_CONT26: Generate outward supply return like GSTR3B, GSTR-1 ,GSTR-4 , GSTR 9 or any other returns as the case may be
LBL_MSME_CONT27: Generating mismatch report between downloaded GSTR2A and Local purchase register to help prepare GSTR2.
LBL_MSME_CONT28: Create mismatch report based on GSTR-2A downloaded from GST portal and Purchase register maintained by the system and then create GSTR-2
LBL_MSME_CONT29: Create draft Annual Return based on monthly/quarterly returns Filed.
LBL_MSME_DSCLMR1: GSTN intends to create an ecosystem to offer Accounting & Billing Software(''Software'') for taxpayers whose annual turnover is less than 1.5 Cr and handling and support thereto vis-a-vis the Software.
LBL_MSME_DSCLMR2: GSTN makes no representations or warranty whatsoever about the Accounting & Billing Software(''Software'') which you may access through
LBL_MSME_DSCLMR3: (''Website''). When you access the software, please understand it is independent from GSTN, and the GSTN has no control over that Software. GSTN does not endorse or accepts any responsibility the use/misuse by such Software. It is upto you to take necessary precautions. GSTN is not collecting taxpayers' data through the Software in any manner. Please read the terms and conditions of the Software properly before proceeding forward.
LBL_MSME_DCLRTN: I hereby declare that my annual turnover is less than Rs. 1.5 Cr. I understand and agree that GSTN should not be liable in any way for the services in respect of Accounting and Billing Software.
LBL_NOTE_CONT: In case of non-satisfactory support from product owners, the tax payers may write to GSTN on the mail id (ecosystem@gstn.org.in), highlighting their grievance. Please note that they must write to GSTN only after they have exhausted all the escalation levels provided by vendor.

INF_COMP_RATNG:
The Compliance rating indicates the overall compliance behavior of the taxpayer
with respect to return filing. Higher the rating, more compliant is the taxpayer
LBL_BUS_ACTIVITY: Your Current Core Business Activity is -
LBL_SELECTION: If you wish to change your Core Business Activity Kindly select one and Submit again.
LBL_SELECT_COREBUSINESS: Please Identify your Core business as
LBL_NOTES1: 1. You can select only one core business activity.
LBL_NOTES2: 2. In case all activities are applicable to you, Kindly select your core business activity.
LBL_NOTES3: 3. Others will include Work Contract and Other Miscellaneous items.
LBL_NOTES4: 4. In order to understand the definitions of Manufacturer/Trader/Service Provider, you can click on “Information Button”.
LBL_POP_HEADER: Meaning of Manufacturer, Trader and Service Provider
LBL_MANUFACTURER_DESC: A manufacturer is a registered person produces new products from raw materials and components using tools, equipment’s and machines and then sells them to the consumers, wholesalers, distributors, retailers or to the other manufacturers. A manufacturer may sell some more brought out items or may provide some ancillary services with his manufactured goods, but he would continue to be classified as manufacturer because it is the Primary Business Activity.
LBL_TRADER_DESC1: A trader is a registered person who engages in the buying and selling of goods.
LBL_TRADER_DESC2: Traders have been further classified as -
LBL_TRADER_DESC5: Retailer includes a registered person selling goods through e-commerce operators.
LBL_SERVICEPROVIDER_DESC: A service provider is a registered person who provides service to a recipient of service and is neither a manufacturer nor a trader.
LBL_SERVICEPROVIDER_DESC1: e.g. Banking service, IT service, works-contract service, agents, intermediaries, GTAs etc.
LBL_REASON: Reason for Change of Core Business Activity

BNK_POP_MSG: As per Rule 10A, it is mandatory to furnish the bank account details within 30 days from date of grant of registration or before furnishing the details of outward supplies under section 37 in FORM GSTR-1 or using invoice furnishing facility (if applicable) whichever is earlier.
BNK_POP_MSG_EX: You have crossed the time period to provide bank account details in your registration details. Please add the bank account details immediately otherwise your registration may be cancelled by the Proper Officer.
BNK_SUB_MSG_CANCEL: Kindly update your Bank Account details immediately.
BNK_SUB_MSG_EXP: Kindly update your bank account immediately. GSTIN Registration may be cancelled if such details are not updated.
BNK_SUB_MSG_EX: Please ensure that added bank account is linked with the PAN of the business. To proceed further click here.
BNK_SUB_MSG_TP2: days as on today to furnish the bank account details. GSTIN Registration may be cancelled if such details are not updated within the timeline.
OLD_BNK_MSG1: You have not entered your bank account details to your
OLD_BNK_MSG2: . Please enter your Bank Account details by filing Application for Amendment (non-core) now to proceed further.

LBL_BIO_STS_DESC: You are requested to get your Biometric Authentication done for Promoter/Partner and Primary Authorized Signatory by visiting the designated GST Suvidha Kendra within the expiry date (15 days from date of submission of Part B of Form Reg 01) so that the registration process may be completed.
LBL_BIO_DOCSTS_DESC: Your Biometric Verification is already completed. You are requested to get your document verification done for PAS only by visiting the designated GST Suvidha Kendra within the expiry date (15 days from date of submission of Part B of Form Reg 01) so that the registration process may be completed.
LBL_BIO_NOCASE_DESC: You are requested to get your Photo Capture and Document Verification done for Promoter/Partner and Primary Authorized Signatory by visiting the designated GST Suvidha Kendra within the expiry date (15 days from date of submission of Part B of Form REG 01) so that the registration process may be completed.
LBL_BIO_ARNGEN_DESC: You have not visited the GST Suvidha Kendra within the expiry date (15 days from date of submission of Part B of Form REG 01) or you have visited the GST Suvidha Kendra but Biometric Authentication/Document Verification is failed or not completed or you have availed option under Rule 14A and Aadhaar Authentication is failed or not completed within expiry date.
LBL_MYSAVE_BIO_NOTE: ARN will not be generated if you have not visited the GSK within expiry date (15 days from date of submission of Part B of Form REG 01) or if you have visited GSK but Biometric Authentication/Document Verification is failed or not completed.
LBL_MYSAVE_BIO_NOTE_NO: ARN will not be generated if you have not visited the GSK within expiry date (15 days from date of submission of Part B of Form REG 01) or if you have visited GSK but Photo is not captured and/or documents which are required to be shown at GSK are not successfully verified.
LBL_MYSAVE_BIO_NOTE_NO1: ARN will not be generated if you have not visited the GSK within expiry date (15 days from date of submission of Part B of Form REG 01) or if you have visited GSK but Biometric Authentication/Document Verification is failed or not completed or if you have availed option under Rule 14A and Aadhaar Authentication is failed or not completed within expiry date.

HLP_BIO_NO_AUTH_STS: Click here to check the Document Verification Status
LBL_MYSAVE_BIO_NOTE: ARN will not be generated if you have not visited the GSK within expiry date (15 days from date of submission of Part B of Form Reg 01) or if you have visited GSK but Biometric Authentication/Document Verification is failed or not completed.

as per the Quarterly Return Monthly Payment [QRMP]
scheme from January 2021 onwards.
profileNAMsg: * Not Applicable implies either the taxpayer type is not registered or Cancelled or Composition.
ERR_NOT_REG: Taxpayer type is not active for the selected period.
TLT_TICKMARK: The bank account validation is successful. Refunds can be Filed using this account
TLT_CROSSMARK: The bank account validation failed. Refund can't be Filed using this bank account. Kindly remove the account or rectify with correct information
TLT_EXCLAMARK: The bank account information has some issues. However, refund can be Filed using this account
LBL_BANKDETAILS_ERR: Kindly Add Bank Account details by filling Non-Core Amendment to proceed ahead
LBL_EDIT_ERR: Dear Tax-Payer, the application cannot be viewed due to security reasons
LBL_DOWNLOAD_ERR: Error, the application cannot be downloaded
EINV_ENABLED_STS_PT1: The above enablement status is based on aggregate annual turnover computations based on GSTR-3B filing.
EINV_ENABLED_STS_PT2: The 'enablement' status on the portal doesn't mean that the GSTIN is supposed to do e-invoicing. If a taxpayer is exempt from e-invoicing or e-invoicing is not applicable to a taxpayer for any other reason, they need not be concerned about the enablement status and may please ignore the same.
EINV_ENABLED_STS_PT3: Please note that on fulfilment of prescribed conditions, the legal obligation to prepare invoice in terms of Rule 48(4) of CGST/SGST Rules, lies with concerned registered person.
ADHR_MYPROFILETAB_ES: Please authenticate your Aadhaar. In case Aadhaar is not available, you can upload e-KYC details with Aadhaar Enrollment ID.
ADHR_SEND_VER_LINK_SCS_MSG_ES: Aadhaar Authentication link are shared on the Email and Mobile Number registered with GST of the Unregistered Applicant.
IMG_UPLD_POPUP: Dear Taxpayer, Please update your photograph in the Edit Profile Page. To proceed further, Click on the below button
ECOM_HAS_GST_POPUP: The GSTIN is already registered using the same PAN used for getting the Enrolment ID <> and in Active/Suspended status. You are requested to use the registered GSTIN to access the portal.
TXT_GTA_CONFIRM: If you are providing a Goods Transport Agencies (GTA) Services and wish to opt for payment of tax on forward charge mechanism, please click on ‘Proceed’ button or click on ‘Go to Dashboard’ button to redirect to the dashboard page.
MSG_GTA_CHECK: Please select both checkboxes to file Annexure V
LBL_GTA_TITLE: Annexure V: Furnishing Declaration for Opting Forward Charge Payment by GTA
LBL_DEC_INF: I hereby solemnly affirm and declare that the information given herein above is true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief and nothing has been concealed therefrom.
MSG_SUBMITTED_SUCCESS: Your form has been signed successfully through EVC
LBL_GDS_N_SRVS_IDN_NO: Goods and Services Tax Identification Number (GSTIN)
HEAD_SYS_GEN_ACK: It is a system generated acknowledgement and does not require any signature.
TXT_MANUAL_UPLOAD_CONFIRM: Taxpayers who Filed their declaration in the Financial Year 2023-24 manually, only required to upload their acknowledged copy of Annexure V.
ANNX5_MSG_GTA_CHECK: Please select both checkboxes to file Annexure V
ANNX6_MSG_GTA_CHECK: Please select all checkboxes to file Annexure VI
ANNX5_LBL_GTA_TITLE: Annexure V: Furnishing Declaration for Opting Forward Charge Payment by GTA
HEAD_SCSS_MSG_GTA: You have Filed the declaration successfully and the particulars of the Form Annexure V are given as under :
ANNX5_HEAD_SCSS_MSG_GTA: You have Filed the declaration successfully and the particulars of the Form Annexure V are given as under :
ANNX6_HEAD_SCSS_MSG_GTA: You have Filed the declaration successfully and the particulars of the Form Annexure VI are given as under :
MSG_GTA_DECLARATION: Declaration in Annexure V has already been Filed for the selected Financial Year. Click on ‘Download Annexure V’ button to download the declaration
ANNX5_MSG_GTA_DECLARATION: Declaration in Annexure V has already been Filed for the selected Financial Year. Click on ‘Download Annexure V’ button to download the declaration
ANNX6_MSG_GTA_DECLARATION: Declaration in Annexure VI has already been Filed for the selected Financial Year. Click on ‘Download Annexure VI’ button to download the declaration
MSG_GTA_FILED: The information in the downloaded Annexure Form is provided as per information and declarations given by the taxpayer at the time of filling Annexure Form for the respective Financial Year.
ANNX5_MSG_GTA_FILED: The information in the downloaded Annexure V is provided as per information and declarations given by the Taxpayer at the time of filing Annexure V for the respective year.
ANNX6_MSG_GTA_FILED: The information in the downloaded Annexure VI is provided as per information and declarations given by the Taxpayer at the time of filing Annexure VI for the respective year.
ANNX6_LBL_GTA_FMCNT: Form for exercising option by a Goods Transport Agency intending to revert under reverse charge mechanism to be Filed before the commencement of any financial year to be submitted before the jurisdictional GST Authority.
ANNX5_LBL_GTA_FMCNT: Form for exercising the option by a Goods Transport Agency (GTA) for payment of GST on the GTA services supplied by him under forward charge
LBL_GTA_FMCNT: Form for exercising the option by a Goods Transport Agency (GTA) for payment of GST on the GTA services supplied by him under forward charge
LBL_GTA_DECL1: I understand that this option once exercised shall not be allowed to be changed within a period of one year from the date of exercising the option and will remain valid till the start of the financial year for which I exercise option to revert under reverse charge mechanism by filing Annexure VI on or before the due date.
LBL_GTA_ANNEXURE_VI_TITLE: Annexure VI: Furnishing Declaration for Opting Reverse Charge Payment by GTA
ELEC_CREDIT_REV_RECLAIM_STMT: Electronic Credit Reversal and Re-claimed Statement
ADHR_RESEND_VER_LINK: Aadhaar Authentication Link reshared on the Email and Mobile Number registered with GST of the selected Promoter/Partner and Primary Authorized Signatory.
RESEND_VERIFICATION_MESG_NT: Aadhaar Authentication Link reshared on the Email and Mobile Number registered with GST of the selected Promoter/Partner and Primary Authorized Signatory.
RESEND_VEERIFICATION_MESG_TCS: Aadhaar Authentication Link reshared on the Email and Mobile Number registered with GST of the Primary Authorized Signatory.
RESEND_VERIFICATION_MESG_RF: Aadhaar Authentication Link reshared on the Email and Mobile Number registered with GST of the Unregistered Applicant.
ECOM_THRESHOLD_LMT: You have crossed the threshold limit of turnover and requested to take a new registration and get GSTIN number.
SME_WELCOME_MESSAGE: Temporary Login credentials has been successfully sent to your registered email id and mobile number.
FIRST_TIME_LOGIN: Please login using First Time Login link on website.
ERR_USER_ALREADY_CREATED: Username already created for the user.
ERR_SYSTEM_ERROR: System error occurred!! Please try again after sometime
GTA_MENU_ANX_V: Opting Forward Charge Payment by GTA (Annexure V)
GTA_MENU_ANX_VI: Opting to Revert Under Reverse Charge Payment by GTA (Annexure VI)
GTA_ANX_VI_TITLE: Annexure VI: Furnishing Declaration for Opting Reverse Charge Payment by GTA
GTA_ANX_VI_POPUP: Option already exercised in Annexure V by you for the Financial Year <Filed Financial Year> onwards will be discontinued and your payment option would be changed from Forward Charge Mechanism to Reverse Charge Mechanism. Click on 'PROCEED' button to continue or click on 'GO TO DASHBOARD' button to continue the earlier Filed option and redirect to the dashboard.
LBL_GTA_DECL2: I hereby declare that I want to revert to reverse charge mechanism for Financial Year
GTA_UPLOAD_DECL: I declare that Annexure V has been manually Filed by me at the jurisdictional office and it has been duly acknowledged by the jurisdiction proper officer, the information furnished by me is true.
GTA_UP_POPUPNOTE: Please upload clear and legible copy duly acknowledged in the jurisdictional office within given time as per Notification No. 05/2023- Central Tax (Rate).
GTA_UP_SAVENOTE: The reference number is generated with reference to your manually uploaded document.
GTA_UP_FTYPE: File with PDF format is only allowed.
GTA_UP_FSIZE: Maximum file size for upload is 2MB.
ANNX6_ERROR: You have not Filed Annexure V for any of the previous Financial Year to pay tax under Forward Charge Mechanism and you are currently placed under Reverse Charge Mechanism.
GTA_DECL_3_ANNX6: I understand that this option once exercised shall not be allowed to be changed within a period of one year from the date of exercising the option and will remain valid till the end of the financial year for which it is exercised.
TXT_GTA_CONFIRM_VI: Option already exercised in Annexure V by you will be discontinued and your payment option would be changed from Forward Charge Mechanism to Reverse Charge Mechanism. Click on 'PROCEED' button to continue or click on 'GO TO DASHBOARD' button to continue the earlier Filed option and redirect to the dashboard.
ANNX6_RBN_GTA_TITLE: Annexure VI - Furnishing Declaration intending to revert under Reverse Charge mechanism
W_RSB_REMARKS: Task is pending with Officer to take action
W_SUB_REMARKS: Details shared to taxpayer on email/SMS.Pending with jurisdictional tax authority for action
W_ARS_REMARKS: Task is pending with Officer to take action
W_CLR_REMARKS: Notice for denial of option to pay tax under composition scheme is issued to taxpayer and waiting for reply to SCN/personal hearing
W_RJT_REMARKS: Tax Officer has rejected the reply to SCN. Order for rejection of reply to show cause notice is issued
W_APR_REMARKS: Tax Officer has accepted the reply to SCN. Order for acceptance of reply to show cause notice is issued
W_SUB_STATUS: Application for Cancellation filed and pending for Processing
W_ARS_STATUS: Clarification Not Filed – Pending for Order
LBL_TYP_SUP_OIDAR: Supply of Online Information and Database Access or Retrieval Services
LBL_TYP_SUP_OIDAR_OMG: Supply of Online Money Gaming and Online Information and Database Access or Retrieval Services
LBL_TEMPID_TEXT_PARTA: Temporary Identification Number under Rule 16A to make payment
LBL_OPN_NOTICES_TBL_HDR_6: Only notices/intimations issued in last 60 days by Adjudicating Authority & Enforcement officers are currently included in the count and their list is displayed on the next screen. To view all notices or orders, please navigate to "View Notices and Orders" and/or "View Additional Notices and Orders".
LBL_TMP_EFFDATE: Effective Date of Registration / Temporary ID
HEAD_DTL_TEMPID_GRTD: Details of the person in whose name Temporary ID is granted
